title: A zero-gap silicon membrane with defined pore size and porosity for alkaline electrolysis

Akash Raman, Sjoerd van der Werf, Cavit Eyövge, Miguel Angel Rodriguez Olguin, Stefan Schlautmann, David Fernandez Rivas, Bastian Mei, Han J.G.E. Gardeniers, Arturo Susarrey-Arce
Porous separators are a key component in alkaline water electrolyzers and are significant sources of overpotential. In this paper, porous silicon separators were fabricated by etching precise arrays of cylindrical...
